name: Alien Escape (itch) (Djentalist)
description:
- CONTROLS -
press SPACEBAR to shoot and launch yourself upwards
hold the button to charge and release it to jump higher!

- LORE -
You are an alien trying to escape a lab that has been inconveniently built in an active volcano. The lava fried the circuits of all the the robots and made them aggressive to everyone in sight. Will you be able to escape?! (answer: no, but you can still try to get a high score :D)

- NOTES -
This game was made under time pressure for a game jam, centered around only using a single button.
